head.title: Woman, 78, Fatally Shot; Granddaughter Is Hurt

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/U.S./U.S. States, Territories and Possessions/New York

hedline.hl1: Woman, 78, Fatally Shot; Granddaughter Is Hurt

abstract.p: Ella Mae Martin, 78, is fatally shot while sleeping and granddaughter, Kenya Martin, is shot in face; police search for Robert Longo, granddaughter's boyfriend and father of her two children (S)

block.p: A 78-year-old woman was fatally shot in the head as she slept in her bed and her 22-year-old granddaughter was shot in the face yesterday morning, the police said.

Detectives from the 32nd Precinct were looking for the granddaughter's boyfriend, Robert Longo, 26, who is suspected of shooting the two women in the third-floor apartment at 2430 Adam Clayton Powell Boulevard about 9:30 a.m., the police said.

Detectives from the 32nd Precinct were looking for the granddaughter's boyfriend, Robert Longo, 26, who is suspected of shooting the two women in the third-floor apartment at 2430 Adam Clayton Powell Boulevard about 9:30 a.m., the police said.

The dead woman was Ella Mae Martin, the police said. The granddaughter, Kenya Martin, who lives in the Bronx and has two children with the suspect, was taken to Harlem Hospital, where she was in stable condition, the police said.
